column5: While searching around the web a while back i come across a map that had a lake (Kag) in this case that you could touch on it anywhere and it gave you the GPS coordinates. I am not sure where I came across it. Does anyone know of this?
You can do it on google maps and google earth too
If you have an IPhone you can go to the App Store and download Topo Maps Canada. It allows you to flag spots and gives you gps coordinates
Yes, it was google maps. I re-discovered that last evening. Kind of a neat feature.
